diseases.name: Banana Black Sigatoka Disease
diseases.description: Black Sigatoka, also known as black leaf streak, is a fungal disease caused by *Mycosphaerella fijiensis*. It leads to significant reductions in leaf area, resulting in yield losses of 50% or more and premature ripening, a serious defect in exported fruit.
symptoms: Dark streaks on the upper side of leaves.

prescribed_medicines.name: Fungicide A
prescribed_medicines.description: A systemic fungicide effective against *M. fijiensis*, applied as a foliar spray.

prescribed_medicines.name: Fungicide B
prescribed_medicines.description: A contact fungicide used in rotation with systemic fungicides to prevent resistance.

diseases.name: Banana Bract Mosaic Virus Disease
diseases.description: Banana bract mosaic virus (BBrMV) is an exotic plant pest that causes significant economic losses. The main symptom is the dark, red-brown mosaic pattern found on the banana flower bract.

prescribed_medicines.name: Insecticide C
prescribed_medicines.description: Controls aphid populations, which are vectors for BBrMV transmission.

prescribed_medicines.name: Insecticide D
prescribed_medicines.description: A broad-spectrum insecticide effective against various pests.

diseases.name: Banana Healthy Leaf
diseases.description: A condition where banana leaves remain healthy and free from diseases, ensuring optimal photosynthesis and fruit production.
symptoms: No signs of disease or pests.

prescribed_medicines.name: Fungicide E
prescribed_medicines.description: A preventive fungicide to maintain leaf health.

prescribed_medicines.name: Fungicide F
prescribed_medicines.description: A broad-spectrum fungicide for general leaf protection.

diseases.name: Banana Insect Pest Disease
diseases.description: Various insect pests affect banana plants, causing damage to leaves, fruits, and stems.

prescribed_medicines.name: Insecticide E
prescribed_medicines.description: A systemic insecticide targeting root-feeding pests.

prescribed_medicines.name: Insecticide F
prescribed_medicines.description: A contact insecticide effective against leaf-feeding insects.

diseases.name: Banana Moko Disease
diseases.description: Moko disease is caused by the bacterium *Ralstonia solanacearum*. It leads to wilting and death of banana plants.

prescribed_medicines.name: Antibiotic G
prescribed_medicines.description: An antibiotic used to control bacterial infections in plants.

prescribed_medicines.name: Antibiotic H
prescribed_medicines.description: A broad-spectrum antibiotic effective against various plant pathogens.

diseases.name: Banana Panama Disease
diseases.description: Panama disease is caused by the soil-borne fungus *Fusarium oxysporum* f.sp. *cubense*. It causes wilting and death of banana plants.

prescribed_medicines.name: Fungicide G
prescribed_medicines.description: A soil-applied fungicide effective against *F. oxysporum*.

prescribed_medicines.name: Fungicide H
prescribed_medicines.description: A systemic fungicide used to control soil-borne pathogens.

diseases.name: Banana Yellow Sigatoka Disease
diseases.description: Yellow Sigatoka is caused by the fungus *Mycosphaerella musicola*. It leads to premature leaf death and reduced yield.

prescribed_medicines.name: Fungicide I
prescribed_medicines.description: A systemic fungicide effective against *M. musicola*.

prescribed_medicines.name: Fungicide J
prescribed_medicines.description: A contact fungicide used in rotation with systemic fungicides.
